Hero.title: Innovative Cleaning, Exceptional Results
Hero.Description: Enjoy advanced cleaning, designed to deliver exceptional results and meet your specific needs, in Agadir and throughout Morocco.

service.title: Our Modular Cleaning Services
service.paragraph: tailored to your needs and budget. Our services are fully customizable to meet your specific requirements.
service.listItem1: Cleaning techniques adapted to your premises.
service.listItem3: Frequency of visits by our agents adjusted to your needs.
service.listItem5: Dedicated client area to track your services.

service1.title: Regular Cleaning Services
service1.description: Periodic cleaning, hygiene product supply, and waste management.

service2.title: Disinfection of Your Premises
service2.description: Disinfection of contact surfaces and fogging disinfection.

service3.title: Additional Cleaning Services
service3.description: Window cleaning, floor maintenance and restoration, façade cleaning, and more.

service4.title: Restoration Services
service4.description: Interventions after construction work, disasters, or on-demand.

service2.title: Most Popular Services
service2.description: We offer a wide range of cleaning services to keep your space spotless and comfortable. Choose from our most popular options below.

service1.title: Facade Cleaning
service1.description: We carry out thorough cleaning of facades to ensure perfect clarity and optimal functionality.

service2.title: Solar Panel Cleaning
service2.description: We clean your solar panels to maximize their efficiency by removing dust and impurities.

service3.title: Home Electrical Maintenance
service3.description: We respond quickly to repair your home electrical installations, ensuring safety and compliance.

service4.title: Home Plumbing and Piping
service4.description: We respond quickly to repair your home plumbing installations, providing a reliable and long-lasting service.

service5.title: Pest Control
service5.description: We effectively eliminate pests from your home, ensuring a healthy and secure environment.

sectionmap.title: Find the Nearest Regional Office
sectionmap.description1: To meet your tailored cleaning needs, we accompany you wherever you are in Morocco. Thanks to our network, we cover the entire country, from Tangier to Dakhla, including Agadir, Marrakech, Casablanca, and Rabat.
sectionmap.button: Discover the cities where we operate

Features.description: Specializing in cleaning and maintenance, including facades and high-rise buildings, we offer high-quality cleaning services for all your professional premises.

About.Description: At Ocean Connecting, we are experts in facade cleaning. Using advanced techniques and eco-friendly products, we ensure a brilliant and lasting cleanliness. Our qualified team is trained to maintain all surfaces, whether commercial or residential buildings.
About.Description2: Trust Ocean Connecting to restore your facade's original shine.

Team.Description: Our team is made up of qualified and passionate professionals, ready to provide you with the highest quality cleaning services. Each member is trained to meet your specific needs with rigor and professionalism.

Contactform.title: Contact Us Quickly
Contactform.message: Thank you for contacting us! We have received your information and our team will get in touch with you soon. Thank you for your interest and see you soon!

Contact.description: Welcome to Ocean Connecting! We are pleased to offer you top-notch facade and solar panel cleaning services. Please fill out the contact form below to get in touch with us. We are here to ensure your property shines and operates optimally. Thank you for choosing us!

Electricity.description: Welcome to Ocean Connecting! We are pleased to offer you top-notch facade and solar panel cleaning services. Please fill out the contact form below to get in touch with us. We are here to ensure your property shines and operates optimally. Thank you for choosing us!

Startpage1.title: Electrical Work in Agadir: Building and Industrial
Startpage1.description: Specialized in the field of electricity in AGADIR for over 10 years, we boast long-term collaboration with prestigious electrical equipment brands such as Legrand, Schneider, Hager, INGELEC. We offer our clients very advantageous rates for their renovation works, troubleshooting, and more. All our electrical equipment comes with manufacturer warranties.

listItems.tist1: Installation and repair of electrical outlets

Startpage2.title: YOUR ELECTRICAL COMPANY IN AGADIR AND SURROUNDINGS
Startpage2.description: Choosing OCEAN CONNECTING means benefiting from recognized expertise in the field with compliant and secure installations. We offer a complete range of services, from installation to maintenance, using quality materials and innovative technologies. Our team offers personalized service, transparent rates, and clear quotes. We guarantee the quality of our services with coverage on all our products and respect of deadlines, usually in 3 to 5 days. Opt for OCEAN CONNECTING SERVICES for reliable, fast, and quality service.

Startpage3.title: When to Call an Electrician?
Startpage3.description: Power outage, short circuit, repair of a roller shutter motor breakdown, or solving a lighting issue... The reasons for requesting electrical troubleshooting are numerous.
Startpage3.description1: That's why Ocean Connecting offers you fast service, with electricians able to intervene urgently, or by appointment. Carefully selected, these qualified professionals can address various issues, from the simplest to the most complex projects. Committed to quality work, our artisans know how to operate in strict compliance with current standards and protocols, to conduct their work under good conditions.
Startpage3.description2: You can contact our artisans in the following cases:

listItems.tist2: Complete renovation of a home's electrical system.
listItems.tist3: Installation or repair of a light point.
listItems.tist4: Repair of an electrical panel fault.
listItems.tist5: Supply and installation of an electrical panel.
listItems.tist6: Supply and installation of an electric heater.
listItems.tist7: Creation or repair of an electrical outlet.

Startpage4.title: Some Clarifications on Electrical Work.
Startpage4.description: It is important to note that certain types of work require only the intervention of an EDF expert or your electricity supplier, especially for interventions affecting the electrical meter. It ensures the interface between your home and your energy supplier, allowing precise billing of your energy consumption. Good practice: MesDépanneurs.fr artisans travel to provide a free quote. As for the rates of our experts' various services, they are specified in indicative ranges on our website. This way, you avoid surprises and unexpected costs!

faqItems.question1: 1. What types of electrical repairs do you perform?
faqItems.answer1: We repair defective electrical installations, faulty outlets and switches, short circuits, light failures, as well as the installation and repair of circuit breakers and electrical panels.
faqItems.question2: 2. Do you provide emergency electrical services?
faqItems.answer2: Yes, we offer a 24/7 emergency service to resolve critical electrical faults and ensure the safety of your installation.
faqItems.question3: 3. Do you provide a quote before the intervention?
faqItems.answer3: Yes, we provide a free and detailed quote before any intervention, so you know exactly what will be repaired and at what cost.
faqItems.question4: 4. Can you work on old installations?
faqItems.answer4: Yes, we work on all electrical installations, whether recent or old, and ensure compliance with current safety standards.
faqItems.question5: 5. How long does an electrical repair take?
faqItems.answer5: The duration of the intervention depends on the nature of the problem, but in general, electrical repairs are completed within 1 to 2 hours.
